task.title: Installing DITA Open Toolkit
task.shortdesc: The DITA-OT distribution package can be installed on Linux, macOS, and Windows. It contains everything that you need to run the toolkit except for Java.

keywords.indexterm: Java Java Development Kit (JDK) Java Runtime Environment (JRE)

li.p: Ensure that you have a Java Runtime Environment (JRE) or Java Development Kit (JDK).

ul.li:
